snippet.title: SuperFarm - PS2 Playable Demo
snippet.description:
Captured off the PS2 using the Kaico HDMI converter.

You may best know Asobo Studio for developing A Plague Tale series and Microsoft Flight Simulator on PC and Xbox Series X/S. But ever wanted to know what was their first game?

Let me introduce you to SuperFarm, the bizarre, obscure, slapstick PAL exclusive PS2 game that started it all... at least the demo version you are seeing here.

Oh, and as a side note: the game did eventually see a re-release in 2013 for Windows 8, but sadly, the game is no longer available to download from the Microsoft Store, meaning the PC version is now considered lost media.

SuperFarm (C) Asobo Studio
